itemId.description: UUID of the associated item record

bindItemId.description: UUID of the associated bind item record

bindItemTenantId.description: Bind item tenant for ECS-enabled clusters

poLineId.description: UUID of the purchase order line this record is associated with

displayOnHolding.description: Whether or not receiving history should be displayed in holding record view

displayToPublic.description: Whether or not the piece data should display to patrons at point of receipt

sequenceNumber.description: The sequence number of this piece to determine the order in which it appears

enumeration.description: Enumeration is the descriptive information for the numbering scheme of a serial. Synchronized with inventory item.

chronology.description: Chronology is the descriptive information for the dating scheme of a serial. Synchronized with inventory item.

barcode.description: Barcode is the descriptive information for the barcode of a serial. Synchronized with inventory item.

accessionNumber.description: AccessionNumber is the descriptive information for the accession number of a serial. Synchronized with inventory item.

callNumber.description: CallNumber is the descriptive information for the call number of a serial. Synchronized with inventory item.

discoverySuppress.description: Records the fact that the record should not be displayed in a discovery system

supplement.description: Whether or not this is supplementary material

isBound.description: Whether or not piece has already been bound

receiptDate.description: Date that associated item is expected to arrive

receivedDate.description: The date associated item is actually received

statusUpdatedDate.description: Date when the status of this piece was last updated

claimingInterval.description: Time interval (in days) for processing claims related to this piece

internalNote.description: Internal note for Send Claim action

externalNote.description: External note for Send Claim action to share with Vendor
